Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory170.png'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Granton', 3: 'Ouch... No, not the artifact...', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Camu', 3: 'Cut the nonsense.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Granton finally passed out after a heavy kick from Camu, who also took the artifact.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Camu', 3: '【kuroname】, you take this one.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'I thought Camu would put this artifact in his bag, but he only carefully examined it and tossed it to me.'}
{2: "Aren't you going to take it?", 3: '9', 4: "I don't think it's safe in my hands. Are you sure?", 5: '10'}
{2: 'Camu', 3: 'I already have a piece. I need you to hold this one.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Camu', 3: 'This thing will never be safe no matter where we keep it.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Karenina', 3: 'Wait. Was that an earthquake?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vera', 3: 'No need to ask, Karenina. It was an earthquake indeed.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "Hey, Gray Raven. Lucia said they were going to search for Liv down there, didn't she? Could this have anything to do with them...", 4: '1'}
{2: "Lucia's team is in danger.", 3: '15', 4: 'It could just be a normal earthquake.', 5: '16'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "Let's go check them out!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "Are you dumb? No way that was normal! Let's go down and check what happened!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: '【kuroname】 can go alone. Your strength is needed elsewhere, Karenina.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: 'Vera?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "...Don't you understand? It's the King. He was hiding his power so we could collect the artifact for him.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'We agreed, so nothing happened to us. But Lucia must have rejected. I\'m sure she even said things like "I\'ll stop your evil plan".', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: 'That just gives me more reason to go!', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Camu', 3: "What can you possibly do? We can't kill an enemy without HP bar in this game.", 4: '3'}
{2: 'Camu', 3: "...Plus, he's the King. It will be impossible to kill him unless some special mechanism is triggered.", 4: '3'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'Before we entered the game, Kamui also said players could not kill important NPCs...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'The right option is to just let the King beat them, so victory will be ours.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: 'Do you still care so much?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "Didn't you also play this game because you wanted to win?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Camu', 3: "Vera, we're running out of time.", 4: '3'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vera', 3: "I kind of saw this coming. Fine, just hold 【kuroname】's hand and get down there together!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'What!?', 3: '1000', 4: '(Hold Karenina in my arms)', 5: '1001'}
{3: "Before I realized, Vera's attack landed on me, as well as Karenina. "}
{1: '1', 2: 'Karenina', 3: 'Hey, Gray Raven! What are you doing?!', 4: '1'}
{3: "Karenina thought I was going to do something... But I was only trying to protect us from Vera's attack."}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png'}
{3: "As we fell off the high platform, I saw Lucia's team confronting the King."}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "Use as many potions as you have. Don't die, 【kuroname】."}
{3: 'This was the last line I heard before passing out.'}
